member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Max_PositiveNumbers_ReturnsMax
member.summary: Returns the maximum integer in a list of positive numbers.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Max_NegativeNumbers_ReturnsMax
member.summary: Returns the maximum integer in a list containing negative numbers.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Max_EmptyList_ReturnsZero
member.summary: Returns 0 if the list is empty.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.OperationsTests.Max_MixedNumbers_ReturnsMax
member.summary: Returns the maximum integer in a list with mixed positive and negative numbers.
